Name: Lady of Dreams
About the game: Welcome to the East coast, crazy street Playing as Joe, an undercover agent working for Jimmy Craster, you have to become test subject number 47 to learn how the Acronym works and gain access to the Space-changing Ball. ...From the background 'You heard that, Joe,' Jimmy said over the comm - You have to find and disable this fucking ball! - Wipe everyone off the face of the earth, but give me back the Acronym! - Can you hear me? 'Don't let an old friend down, Joe Immerse yourself in the world of parallel dreams, together with Amanda-Service, to fulfill all your desires! Lady of Dreams This is an action-rhythm bagel, whose actions take place in a dream, where music and thoughts merged in one harmony! The environment and missions are created based on your chosen favorite composition. With each completed stage, the game will change its rulesâ€¦ In some cases you have to fight in the subway under ELECTRONIC ROCK In others, cut a bunch of people under Dubstep Third, have fun on the planet Marcean, and destroy everything... But that's not all... You may find yourself in the epicenter of hell listening to METAL ROCK I'll be happy to guide Joe through your parallel worlds. (c) Karen.
